title: Indesign and typographers quotes
content:
in quark (with preferences set to smart quotes on), after importing text, i would just do a simple find/change from " to " and it would automatically do the left and right smart quotes for me.   
   
it seems that indesign is making me do the left and right quotes individually. single quotes are even more problematic.   
   
is there a simpler way?
author: aili
